message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value of your business. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I estimate its worth to be $1500000 to you. Considering this, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1200000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and dedicated support to ensure seamless integration into your operations. I look forward to your positive response.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the asking price of $1200000. I am willing to propose a counteroffer of $1050000. This amount reflects my assessment of the product's worth to me. I hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand the importance of finding a mutually beneficial solution. While I'm unable to match the original asking price, I'm willing to consider a compromise. My counteroffer is $1150000. This price reflects the value of the product while allowing us to work within your budget constraints. I hope this proposal will lead to a successful transaction.
